title: African girl - Malobi
creator_credit: Atlantis Productions and J. Michael Hagopian
brief_description: The activities of a ten year old West African girl who sells her grandfather’s carvings in the market place so that she can go to school. Shows how the West African procures shelter, food and clothing, recreation and education.
description: The activities of a ten year old West African girl who sells her grandfather’s carvings in the market place so that she can go to school. Shows how the West African procures shelter, food and clothing, recreation and education.
